description: This table contains an audit trail history for edits made to a pharmacy enrollment.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RXENROLL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the user record who updated the pharmacy enrollment for a given edit.

columns.name: RXENROLL_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the pharmacy enrollment was updated on this edit

columns.name: ENROLL_PROG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The enrollment program category ID for the pharmacy enrollment on this edit


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RXENROLL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The enrollment status category ID for this enrollment on this edit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Under Review


Enrolled


Disenrolled


Declined


Deleted

columns.name: RXENROLL_ENROLLMENT_DATE
columns.description: The enrollment start date documented for this enrollment on this edit

columns.name: RXENROLL_DISENROLL_DATE
columns.description: The disenrollment date documented on the enrollment on this edit

columns.name: RXENROLL_DECLINE_DATE
columns.description: The decline date documented on the enrollment on this edit
